it.polimi.se2018.model

Class DiagonalsPublicObjectiveCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.ObjectiveCard
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.PublicObjectiveCard
        • it.polimi.se2018.model.DiagonalsPublicObjectiveCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DiagonalsPublicObjectiveCard
extends PublicObjectiveCard
    Public Objective Card that counts the number of diagonally adjacent dice in a window pattern with the same property (color or value)
    Author:
    Jacopo Pio Gargano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
